name: Christmas Bows
description: Large Boutique Christmas bows.  Between 4-5".  $6.00/each

name: Halloween Hair Bows
description: Halloween bows for your special pumpkin.  $5.00/ea on sale!

name: Impressionist Headband
description: Colorful fabric wrapped headbands are comfortable and add a sophisticated touch for girls or women.  $4.00/each

name: Big Flower Headband
description: These HUGE hand made flower headbands are 4 1/2" around and oh-so-comfortable.  The headbands are wrapped with black ribbon.  Flowers have a beautiful, subtle sheen.  Great for girls or women.  $6.00/each

name: Crystal Beaded Bow Headband (More Colors)
description: Luxury quality crystal beaded bow headband perfect for dressing up or adding flair to the everyday.  Beads are sewn to the ribbon so they stay put!  Headbands are ribbon wrapped and extremely comfortable. Bows are approximately 3 1/2" long by 1 1/2" wide.   Can be worn by girls or women.  Available in Black, Pale Pink, or Champagne.  $6.50

name: Eyelet Chiffon Clips
description:
Eyelet chiffon clips available in a variety of colors for all seasons.  Perfect for clipping in hair or accessorizing fall jackets.  $3.50/each

We can also create custom headbands with one or two eyelet flowers.  See our headbands page for details.

name: Large Silk Bow Headband
description: These beautiful headbands speak for themselves!  Bows measure appx 5" across and 1 1/2" wide.  Headband is wrapped in coordinating ribbon.  Very comfortable to wear.  $5/each

name: Burberry Inspired Plaid Headband
description:
Sophisticated Burberry Inspired plaid headband is lined in a faux-suede fabric for comfort.  Approximately 1/2" thick.  $6.00/each

We can add a black eyelet lace flower to this headband for a truly special headband.  $8.00/each

name: Custom Eyelet Headbands
description:
Pick your flower colors, pick your headband colors.  Custom made for you!  Single flower, $6.50, Double flower, $8.50.  

Instructions for ordering:  Email request for color choices to info@pinkprincesslife.com upon completing your order.

Flower Color Choices:

Black
Coral
Fuschia
Harvest Gold
Ivory
Peacock Blue
Pink
Sand

Headband Color Choices:

Black
Coral
Forest
Harvest Gold
Mustard
Neon Yellow
Pink

name: Vintage Style Scalloped Fabric Bow
description:
This gorgeous bow is the perfect finishing touch to a variety of looks.  The textured fabric is lovely and trimmed in a delicate ivory scalloped edge.  It measures a little over 3 1/2" and is held securely by an alligator clip.  The timeless colors are sure to delight in shades of peach, cream, deep sea blue and vibrant fuschia.  $4.00/each

No hair yet?  Just love headbands?  Add on a crochet headband for only $1!  Hair bows clip onto the headbands for unlimited interchangeable styles.  See listing on products page under headbands.

name: Vintage Style Chiffon Floral Flower Clip Large
description:
These beautiful vintage style flower clips are approximately 4" wide and 2" tall.  They are made of soft and lovely chiffon and lace.   They secure with an alligator clip and are available in a variety of colors as shown.  Order requesting the background color.  $3.50/each

No hair yet?  Just love headbands?  Add on a crochet headband for only $1!  Hair bows clip onto the headbands for unlimited interchangeable styles.

name: Heart Headbands
description: Fun heart headbands are super-comfy.  One and a half inches wide at the widest point, and lined in a soft, suede-like microfiber.  $4.00/each

name: **Clearance** Princess Swim Suit
description: High quality swim suit with rosettes and a tutu skirt that are sure to please.  Sparkly butterfly and "Beach Baby" finish off all the requirements for any princess.  Size 5 is available.  Sorry, others sold out. $10.00

name: Over the Top Boutique Bow
description: Wow!  These bows are so much fun and look great in pictures.  Large bows are over 5" across and are available in bright colors, polka-dots, and animal prints.  And did we mention the feathers?  Secured with a ribbon lined alligator clip.   $6.00/each

name: Crochet Foot Flowers
description:
Wonderful for those barefoot spring and summer days!  Darling crochet foot flowers are perfect for infants or toddlers.  Your princess won't want to take them off! $7.00/pair

*pink with green centers are out of stock*

name: Crochet Cherry Clips (Pair of Two)
description:
Life is just a bowl of cherries!  These delightful crochet cherries are set on 1 1/2" (appx) clips.  The cherries hang approximately 2" long and are available in pairs of either red or pink.  $4.00 per pair

*Pink are currently out of stock*

name: Big Boutique Bow
description:
This bow is the perfect adornment to finish that special outfit or just bring a fabulous touch to everyday wear.  Made of high quality construction, it measures approximately 5" across and features a double prong clip for a secure hold.  The ends are heat sealed to help prevent fraying.  Available in a variety of colors. $5.50/each

No hair yet?  Just love headbands?  Add on a crochet headband for only $1!  Hair bows clip onto the headbands for unlimited interchangeable styles.  See listing on products page under headbands.

name: Polka-dot Ponytail Holder
description:
What makes these fun pony-tail holders special are the bendable wires hidden within the bow that allows them to keep whatever shape you give them.  No sagging bows here!  You will love the scrumptious colors that shout out for summertime.  $3.00/each

Choose from the following colors:

- Peach
- Pastel Pink
- Seafoam
- Navy

name: Lollipop Clips (Pair of Two)
description: Sweets for your sweet!  These delicious clips are available in a wide variety of colors and come in pairs of two.  They secure well with an alligator clip and are approximately 2" long.  Colors listed are for the primary colors in the clip, but will contain other colors in the swirl of the lollipop.  $4.00/pair

name: Ivy Leaf Headband
description: This one is perfect for little princesses as well as grown-up ones!  The quality golden leaf headband is beautiful and elegant.  It fits toddler to adult.  The headband is secured by a black thick elastic band that goes along the neck and the gold leaf along the top of the head.  $8.00/each

name: Patriotic Boutique Hair Bows
description:
Summer's must have for Memorial Day, Flag Day, July 4th, and anytime she wants to display her patriotism princess-style!  Select Style Number from photo as shown.  **On Sale** $5.00 each

Sizes are approximately as follows: 

Style 1: 4 1/2" x 4"
Style 2: 3 1/2" around
Style 3: 5" x 3 1/2"
Style 4: 3 1/2" around
Style 5: 4" x 3"

name: Cherry Clips - Large
description: Our princesses love cherries!  These large cherry clips are appx 3.5" wide and 3" long.  They have soft felt leaves and are adorned with a sweet polkadot bow.  Order two for pigtails or to clip both sides. $3.00/each or pair for $5.00

name: Polka Dot Hair Bows - Medium
description:
These 4" brightly colored polka-dot bows are great for everyday use or making an outfit extra-special.   $2.50/each  

No hair yet?  Add on one or more crochet headbands with hair bow attachment for just $1 each with any order!  All of our hair bows clip to the headband for mix and match wear at any age!

name: Rainbow Korker Bow Clip Large
description:
These large 3" korker bows clip with a ribbon-lined alligator clip.  They come in a variety of fun colors.  Sold individually, order 2 for a pair. $4.00/each

Available in the following colors:

Pink/Yellow/Green/Light Blue

Pink/Yellow/Lime/White

Rainbow - The most colorful combination which could contain any of the following: Red/Orange/Yellow/Light Blue/Green/Orange/Purple/Lavender

name: Dot Clips with Bows - Pair of Two
description: Delightful Navy Polka-dot clips are accented with bows in your choice of cheerful colors.  $3.50/pair

name: Small Polka Dot Bows
description:
These adorable bows will brighten up your day.  Available in sets of two bows of each color with white polka-dots, they are perfect individually or for pigtails.  They are approximately 3" across. $2.00/each  Order two for a pair!



No hair yet?  Just love headbands?  Add on a crochet headband for only $1!  Hair bows clip onto the headbands for unlimited interchangeable styles.  See listing on products page under headbands.

name: Glitter Headband
description: 1/2" Glitter Headband in a variety of colors. Photo coming soon!  $2.00/each

name: Rainbow Korker Ponytail Holder
description:
Lots of fun for your ponytail!  Order two for pigtails.  The korker ponytail holders have so many fun colors and are appx 2" across. $2.50/each

The dark pink options features a dark pink ponytail holder with ribbon colors of dark pink, light pink, light blue, yellow, dark green, and red.

The light pink option features a light pink ponytail holder with ribbon colors of dark pink, light pink, yellow, lime, orange, and red.

name: Polka-Dot Clips - Pair of two
description:
These fun ribbon clips feature 2 1/2" bows with polka-dot buttons.  The clips are 2" long and secured by a double prong clip.  They come in pairs of two with colors as shown.  Perfect for every season! $3.50/pair

*Navy/Red currently out of stock*

name: Crochet Lace Headband - Small
description: Want a different look?  Have a baby princess with not enough hair for clips or bows?  Add a crochet lace headband to any order for just $1.00!  Comes in a variety of colors and has a spot for the bow to clip easily to the headband.  Approximately .8" wide and 15" round.  Elastic stretches - one size fits most infant to adult.
